Curious and active traveler. He has traveled to many countries and will gladly tell you about the culture and language of each country.
Brenda Davies is Professor of Linguistics at the University of Oxford. As an English language specialist, she will help you practice both vocabulary and grammar.
Friendly Californian, likes to socialize with foreigners. He can talk to you about your favorite hobbies and about life in general.
